languages.text: {n}Соломон треплет кибермастифа за холку, губы проктора чуть вздрагивают в печальной улыбке.{/n} "Со мной вы и мой пес — не иначе Император вознаградил меня за службу, дав возможность или доблестно умереть в славной компании, или сообща одолеть невообразимую опасность. Чего еще желать?"

{n}Solomorne ruffles the back of the cyber-mastiff's neck, wearing a sad, slightly tremulous smile.{/n} "I have you and my dog with me — the God-Emperor could grant me no better reward for my service than the chance to either die valiantly in good company or overcome unimaginable peril by your side. What more could I want?"
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон треплет кибермастифа за холку, губы проктора чуть вздрагивают в печальной улыбке.{/n} "Со мной вы и мой пес — не иначе Император вознаградил меня за службу, дав возможность или доблестно умереть в славной компании, или сообща одолеть невообразимую опасность. Чего еще желать?"

What more could I want?"

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはサイバーマスチフの首の後ろを優しくかき乱しながら、悲しげでかすかに震える笑みを浮かべていた。{/n}「あなたと愛犬がそばにいてくれる―この上なく良き仲間とともに勇敢に死ぬか、あなたのそばで想像を絶する危機を乗り越える機会を与えてくださった。神帝陛下が授けてくださる、これ以上の報酬がありましょうか。これ以上、何を望めというんです？」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne ruffles the back of the cyber-mastiff's neck, wearing a sad, slightly tremulous smile.{/n} "I have you and my dog with me — the God-Emperor could grant me no better reward for my service than the chance to either die valiantly in good company or overcome unimaginable peril by your side. What more could I want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはサイバーマスチフの首の後ろを優しくかき乱しながら、悲しげでかすかに震える笑みを浮かべていた。{/n}「あなたと愛犬がそばにいてくれる―この上なく良き仲間とともに勇敢に死ぬか、あなたのそばで想像を絶する危機を乗り越える機会を与えてくださった。神帝陛下が授けてくださる、これ以上の報酬がありましょうか。これ以上、何を望めというんです？」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne krault den Nacken des Cyber-Mastiff mit einem traurigen, leicht zitternden Lächeln.{/n} Ich habe Euch und meinen Hund bei mir – der Gottimperator könnte mir keine bessere Belohnung für meine Dienste gewähren als die Chance, entweder tapfer in guter Gesellschaft zu sterben oder an Eurer Seite unvorstellbare Gefahren zu meistern. Was könnte ich noch mehr wollen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne ruffles the back of the cyber-mastiff's neck, wearing a sad, slightly tremulous smile.{/n} "I have you and my dog with me — the God-Emperor could grant me no better reward for my service than the chance to either die valiantly in good company or overcome unimaginable peril by your side. What more could I want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne krault den Nacken des Cyber-Mastiff mit einem traurigen, leicht zitternden Lächeln.{/n} Ich habe Euch und meinen Hund bei mir – der Gottimperator könnte mir keine bessere Belohnung für meine Dienste gewähren als die Chance, entweder tapfer in guter Gesellschaft zu sterben oder an Eurer Seite unvorstellbare Gefahren zu meistern. Was könnte ich noch mehr wollen?"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne flatte la nuque du cyber-mastiff tandis qu'un sourire mal assuré et triste se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} Je peux compter sur vous et sur mon chien. Je ne pense pas que l'Empereur-Dieu ne puisse me proposer de plus belles récompenses pour mes services : je vais avoir la chance de mourir vaillamment en bonne compagnie, ou le bonheur de survivre à des périls inimaginables à vos côtés. Que pourrais-je espérer de plus ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne ruffles the back of the cyber-mastiff's neck, wearing a sad, slightly tremulous smile.{/n} "I have you and my dog with me — the God-Emperor could grant me no better reward for my service than the chance to either die valiantly in good company or overcome unimaginable peril by your side. What more could I want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne flatte la nuque du cyber-mastiff tandis qu'un sourire mal assuré et triste se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} Je peux compter sur vous et sur mon chien. Je ne pense pas que l'Empereur-Dieu ne puisse me proposer de plus belles récompenses pour mes services : je vais avoir la chance de mourir vaillamment en bonne compagnie, ou le bonheur de survivre à des périls inimaginables à vos côtés. Que pourrais-je espérer de plus ? »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne frota el pescuezo del cibermastín con una sonrisa triste y un tanto trémula.{/n} «Mi perro y usted están conmigo; el Dios Emperador no podría otorgarme mayor recompensa por mis servicios que la oportunidad de morir valerosamente en buena compañía o superar un peligro inimaginable a su lado. ¿Qué más podría pedir?».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne ruffles the back of the cyber-mastiff's neck, wearing a sad, slightly tremulous smile.{/n} "I have you and my dog with me — the God-Emperor could grant me no better reward for my service than the chance to either die valiantly in good company or overcome unimaginable peril by your side. What more could I want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne frota el pescuezo del cibermastín con una sonrisa triste y un tanto trémula.{/n} «Mi perro y usted están conmigo; el Dios Emperador no podría otorgarme mayor recompensa por mis servicios que la oportunidad de morir valerosamente en buena compañía o superar un peligro inimaginable a su lado. ¿Qué más podría pedir?».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙抚摸着格雷托的后颈，脸颊微微颤抖，带着悲伤的笑容。{/n}“你和我的狗都在我身边，这是神皇赐予我最好的奖赏。或许祂希望我能在好伙伴的陪伴下英勇战死，又或许祂希望我能在你身边，共同度过难以想象的危机。我哪里还需要索求别的什么呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne ruffles the back of the cyber-mastiff's neck, wearing a sad, slightly tremulous smile.{/n} "I have you and my dog with me — the God-Emperor could grant me no better reward for my service than the chance to either die valiantly in good company or overcome unimaginable peril by your side. What more could I want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙抚摸着格雷托的后颈，脸颊微微颤抖，带着悲伤的笑容。{/n}“你和我的狗都在我身边，这是神皇赐予我最好的奖赏。或许祂希望我能在好伙伴的陪伴下英勇战死，又或许祂希望我能在你身边，共同度过难以想象的危机。我哪里还需要索求别的什么呢？”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, hüzünlü ve hafifçe titrek bir gülümsemeyle siber mastifin ensesini okşuyor.{/n} "Köpeğime ek olarak yanımda sen varsın. Hizmetimin karşılığında Tanrı İmparator, bana ahlaklı bir topluluk içinde yiğitçe ölme ya da senin yanında akıl almaz bir tehlikenin üstesinden gelme şansından daha büyük bir şeref bahşedemezdi. Daha ne isteyebilirim ki?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne ruffles the back of the cyber-mastiff's neck, wearing a sad, slightly tremulous smile.{/n} "I have you and my dog with me — the God-Emperor could grant me no better reward for my service than the chance to either die valiantly in good company or overcome unimaginable peril by your side. What more could I want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, hüzünlü ve hafifçe titrek bir gülümsemeyle siber mastifin ensesini okşuyor.{/n} "Yanımda köpeğimle beraber sen varsın. Hizmetimin karşılığında Tanrı İmparator, bana ahlaklı bir topluluk içinde yiğitçe ölme ya da senin yanında akıl almaz bir tehlikenin üstesinden gelme şansından daha büyük bir şeref bahşedemezdi. Daha ne isteyebilirim ki?"
